Text: "On the hills of Manchuria" (Russian: На сопках Маньчжурии, Na sopkah Manchzhurii ) is a haunting waltz (i.e. a waltz composed of mostly minor notes and sub-4th octave arrangements) composed in 1906 by Ilya Alekseevich Shatrov.
Triplets:<On the hills of Manchuria
